price: 23. Et ne dis jamais à propos de telle chose : « Je ferai cela demain »,
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
